# metersPerSecondSquared

**Type Property**

Returns the meter per second squared unit of acceleration.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var metersPerSecondSquared: UnitAcceleration { get }
```

## Accessing Predefined Units

- **gravity**: Returns the gravity unit of acceleration.
